response.overview: Left alone while the city rains, two bachelors welcome a new housemate into their home, only for a small incident over a single cigarette to turn the living space miserable. As tensions rise, one of the old housemates is pushed into emotional exhaustion and slowly begins to take on qualities of love and care, reflecting Azhagi’s nature. What unfolds is not a fight, but a quiet transformation shaped by ego, miscommunication, and emotional imbalance.
response.title: The Silk & Cigarettes
